package.name: usearch

actions.action: if usearch --version | grep -q "7.[0-9.]\+"; then echo "USEARCH version OK"; else echo "Wrong USEARCH version or not found" 1>&2; echo "Download from http://www.drive5.com/usearch/download.html" 1>&2; fi;

package.readme: USEARCH cannot be automatically downloaded and installed. Please download it manually from http://www.drive5.com/usearch/download.html and install it somewhere in the PATH of your system.
